Package entity

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Room

    This entity class holds information about a room.

    The related control class is: RoomControl.

    Since:
    14-04-2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sim Jun Kai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
